channel.title: CSCB07 on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in CSCB07 on Notes

item.title: Lab 1
item.description: Lab 1 Notes # Due 05/22/2022 23:59 EST Handy Links: Lab Handout PDF Helpful Cheatsheet for SVN and Bash Installing Eclipse (Windows/Mac/Linux) (You don’t need to do step 4) Installing SVN SVN Repository Details # svn checkout -r 1 https://helixteamhub.cloud/UTSC/projects/tut1/repositories/subversion/lab1 # Username: cscb07 # Password: Cscb07#s22 Note: If you are trying to install homebrew on mac and the install is failing, make sure to turn off any vpn services you have, and make sure you’re using UofT Wifi.

item.title: Lab 2
item.description: Lab 2 Notes # Due 06/05/2022 23:59 EST Handy Links: Lab Handout PDF Set JAVA_HOME macOS Creating Files # Note: You don’t need to use Eclipse or any IDE for this lab, since you will compile and run everything via the terminal. If you don’t like the terminal, you can just treat the $ touch lab2/SomeFile.java $ open lab2/SomeFile.java as just creating and opening a new file using a File Explorer or Text Editor in the /lab2 directory.

item.title: Lab 3
item.description: Lab 3 Notes # Due 06/12/2022 23:59 EST Handy Links: Lab Handout PDF Regex Tester Regex CheatSheet Using BufferedReader (if Scanner is not working) Valid Hashtag is: Start of file: hashtag + whitespace End of file: whitespace + hashtag Everything else: whitespace + hashtag + whitespace Note: Newlines are considered white-space (\n) Example: Line: I can't wait to fail POSt at #UofT #Boundless! There's just #Too#Many#Proofs! #Boundless\n Hashtags: #UofT #Boundless Make sure to escape \ characters on windows

item.title: Lab 4
item.description: Lab 4 Notes # Due 06/26/2022 23:59 EST (2 weeks) Important Links: Lab Handout PDF OOP Example from Lecture The super keyword in Java More info on equals and hashCode Eclipse Error: ...does not declare serialVersionUID fix Creating Subclasses (Inheritance) # Example: public class Square extends Shape { public Square(Any arg) { // Pass `arg` to the `Shape` constructor super(arg); } } The extends keyword makes Square the subclass

item.title: Lab 5
item.description: Lab 5 Notes # Due 07/24/2022 23:59 EST Important Links: Lab Handout PDF https://developer.android.com/studio/install https://developer.android.com/training/basics/firstapp/creating-project Files For Submission # Do not submit any code, only these screenshots are enough. Screenshot of the main activity (EditText with SEND button) Screenshot of the display message activity (with the message you typed earlier) It is encouraged to customize the application to learn about how stuff works. Try customizing the text and/or add an image like this
